title: Frontline Attack: War Over Europe (World War II: Panzer Claws)
description:
Frontline Attack: War Over Europe/World War II: Panzer Claws
============================================================
INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS:
	- Mount FA.iso with Daemon Tools/PowerISO and install to desired location.
	- Apply the patch located in the Patch_117 folder.
	- Copy the crack from the crack folder to the game folder.
	- In case the game asks for a serial, please find it in the serial.txt file located in the Crack folder.
	- That's it, enjoy this release!
============================================================
System Requirements:
	Pentium II 350MHz
	64 MB RAM
	32 MB DirectX 8.1 Graphic Card
	DirectX 8.1 Compatible Sound Card
============================================================
WORLD WAR II: PANZER CLAWS [aka Frontline Attack: War over Europe] pushes back the boundaries of real-time strategy gaming! 
Take control of the Allied, German, or the Russian in the harsh reality of the battlefields of World War II. At your disposal are a vast number of vehicles and tanks, as well as ground troops and the ability to call in air forces when needed. All these elements must be used in order to obtain the ultimate prize: Victory! 
============================================================
I have personally been looking for this game for quite some time now on the interwebs, however, it is nowhere to be found. So, I decided to upload it myself. Hope you enjoy this classic!	

released by neohacker21
